translated: and it is situated below the skull.🔽Think that a wind mandala arises from yam,🔽and it is situated below the fire.🔽Think that a skull arises from a,🔽and it is situated below the wind.

original: bsam/_/bi las shar du dri chen bsam/_/shu las lho ru byang chub sems/_/
analyzed: bsam/_/bi las shar du dri chen bsam/_/shu las lho ru byang chub sems/_/
translated: and bodhicitta in the south from śu.🔽Think of the self-originated water in the west from ra,

original: ra las nub tu rang byung mtshhal_/_/ma las byang du dri chu bsam/_/mu las🔽gtor ma/
analyzed: ra las nub tu rang byung mtshhal_/_/ma las byang du dri chu bsam/_/mu las gtor ma/
translated: and urine in the north from ma.🔽Think of the great medicine in the center from mu.

original: dbus su sman chen bsam/_/shar du rgyu la lho ru om_/_/nub tu bye la byang du
analyzed: dbus su sman chen bsam/_/shar du rgyu la lho ru om_/_/nub tu bye la byang du
translated: Think of the seed syllable in the east from gya, in the south from oṃ,🔽in the west from jya, in the north from khaṃ,🔽and in the center, the syllable hūṃ.

original: kham/_/dbus su hum yig rnam par bsam/_/_steng du /_rdo rje rgya gram bsgom/_/
analyzed: kham/_/dbus su hum yig rnam par bsam/_/_steng du /_rdo rje rgya gram bsgom/_/
translated: Meditate on the vajra cross above.🔽The wind from yaṃ ignites the fire,

original: yam las rlung byung me sbar la/_/thod pa dros pas bdud rtshi khol/_/rlangs las
analyzed: yam las rlung byung me sbar la/_/thod pa dros pas bdud rtshi khol/_/rlangs las
translated: and the skull is heated, causing the elixir to boil.🔽The light from the🔽steam invokes the five families,

original: 'od byung rigs lnga bskul/_/ye shes bdud rtshi phab la bstim/_/rdo rje yig
analyzed: 'od byung rigs lnga bskul/_/ye shes bdud rtshi phab la bstim/_/rdo rje yig
translated: and the elixir of timeless awareness is absorbed.🔽The vajra and the seed syllables melt,

original: 'bru bcas pa zhu/_/'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/_/gnyis su med
analyzed: 'bru bcas pa zhu/_/'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/_/gnyis su med
translated: and the consecration is performed with the three seed syllables.🔽Make the offering of nonduality,

original: pa'i mchod pa dbul/_/mchod bstod smon lam rgyas par bya/_/om ya ma ka la
analyzed: pa'i mchod pa dbul/_/mchod bstod smon lam rgyas par bya/_/om ya ma ka la
translated: and perform extensive offerings, praises, and aspirations.

original: sarba tu pa sata ma ha ba lim i dam gr-ih+na gr-ih+na kha kha kha hi kha hi/_gtor ma dbul
analyzed: sarba tu pa sata ma ha ba lim i dam gr-ih+na gr-ih+na kha kha kha hi kha hi/_gtor ma dbul
translated: “oṃ yamākalpa sarva duṣṭa mahā baliṃ idaṃ gṛhaṇa gṛhaṇa kha kha khāhi khāhi”🔽Offer the bali.
